project.title: Application Portfolio
project.about: This website was created for my application to a bar – MAKMUR – in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. My intentions were to stand out as an applicant and to propose an idea for a website for MAKMUR. The website was made with simplicity and an aesthetic appeal.
project.res: Completed in two days and submitted my application in time. However, I unfortunately did not receive any feedback from the restaurant.

project.title: MEKRAS
project.about: An Indonesian music festival prototype website created using React.js and TailwindCSS. Aimed to gather all music festival information within one website for one country. Completed as a Frontend class project.
project.res: Despite having no functionality due to project requirement of only frontend implementation, this website has potential to be functional later in the future.

project.title: Off---White
project.about: A skeleton fashion designer brand online apparel copy website created using Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Axios API. Completed as an application project for Google Developers Students Club.
project.res: Website successfully achieved responsiveness, custom stylings, and more frontend features. Approved of position as Hacker at GDSC.

project.title: Prototype Personal Portfolio
project.about: My first personal project, a prototype personal portfolio created with React.js. TailwindCSS was used for stylings and Framer Motion was used for custom animation such as custom cursor along with hover animation.
project.res: Due to structure issues, website lacks responsiveness. Nonetheless, website looks flawless on desktop.
